segments.text: What can I offer you here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I came here to ask for some information .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought a pair of trousers last year , which I like the best . But this year they don ’ t fit me very well . They ’ re tight in the waist , baggy at the knees . Can you make some alterations ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , we are skillful in doing that . You can trust us . Our shop has a history of more than 20 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems I find the right place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , absolutely ! We have a very good reputation in the neighborhood .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When can I have my trousers if I bring it to you tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you like you can wait here . They will be ready in one hour and a half .
segments.speaker: S1
